Author: FeatherMahogany59
Text: Diet pills are typically stimulants or diuretics and stimulant kind can give you a literal heart attack- you’re better off with coffee or something.  If you’re looking for something to make you feel full, try taking a fiber (glucomannan, specifically) supplement with at least 16 ounces of water. It makes me feel SUPER full. You have to take it with a lot of water though to be safe.

Author: livipup
Text: Bad idea. They mostly just dehydrate you so you lose water weight.
